bodhi_desc: สัญชาติ: ไม่ทราย$NL;อายุ: ไม่ทราบ$NL;$NL;Bodhi is known as one of the greatest legends in the world of crime, but few know the man behind the mask. As the founding father of the Ex-Presidents gang, Bodhi's renowned in the criminal underworld for his extreme athleticism and daring heists. His recent feats of strength in Mumbai and Austria got Bain's attention, granting him an invitation to the Payday Gang.
bonnie_desc: สัญชาติ: สก๊อตแลนด์$NL;อายุ: 43$NL;$NL;Bonnie is from Glasgow. That should be enough to strike fear into a man's heart, but Bonnie is also from 1980's Glasgow. These years, the Thatcher era, made already tough towns even harder, and bred a generation of determined, unforgiving Scots. Bonnie is cut from this cloth.
chico_desc: สัญชาติ: คิวบา$NL;อายุ: ไม่ทราบ$NL;$NL;They don't make 'em like Tony anymore. A fast talker who knows what he wants and how to get it. He's the real deal when the shit hits the fan, a true-born heister. He doesn't back down for anyone and he dishes it out just as hard as he can take it. This guy's got balls.

menu_overkill_beta_desc: เบสิค: ##$basic;##$NL;When you kill an enemy with a Shotgun or the OVE9000 portable saw, you receive a ##$multibasic;## damage increase for ##$multibasic2;## seconds.$NL;$NL;เอซ: ##$pro;##$NL;The damage bonus now applies to all weapons. Skill must still be activated using a Shotgun or the OVE9000 portable saw. Your weapon swap speed is increased by ##$multipro;##$NL;$NL;Note: Does not apply to melee damage, throwables, grenade launchers or rocket launchers.
menu_pack_mule_beta_desc: เบสิค: ##$basic;##$NL;You can throw bags ##$multibasic;## further.$NL;$NL;เอซ: ##$pro;##$NL;For each ##$multipro2;## armor points the bag movement penalty is reduced by ##$multipro3;##
menu_permission_help: ตั้งค่าให้ผู้เล่นใดสามารถเข้าร่วมเกมได้ สาธารณะ จะทำให้ผู้เล่นทุกคนสามารถเข้าร่วมได้ และเพื่อนเท่านั้น สามารถเข้าร่วมได้เฉพาะเพื่อนเท่านั้น เกมส่วนตัว สามารถเข้าร่วมได้ผ่านการเชิญเท่านั้น
menu_perseverance_beta_desc: เบสิค: ##$basic;##$NL;Instead of getting downed instantly, you gain the ability to keep on fighting for ##$multibasic2;## seconds with a ##$multibasic3;## movement penalty before going down.$NL;$NL;Note: Does not trigger on fall or fire damage. $NL;$NL;เอซ: ##$pro;##$NL;Increases the duration of Swan Song by ##$multipro;## seconds. Ammunition won't be depleted while the effect is active.
menu_pistol_beta_messiah_desc: เบสิค: ##$basic;##$NL;While in bleedout, you can revive yourself if you kill an enemy. You only have ##$multibasic;## charge.$NL;$NL;เอซ: ##$pro;##$NL;Your messiah charge is replenished whenever you use a doctor bag.

menu_running_from_death_beta_desc: เบสิค: ##$basic;##$NL;You reload and swap weapons ##$multibasic;## faster for ##$multibasic2;## seconds after being revived.$NL;$NL;เอซ: ##$pro;##$NL;You move ##$multipro;## faster for ##$multipro2;## seconds after being revived.
menu_scavenger_beta_desc: เบสิค: ##$basic;##$NL;When your armor breaks your movement speed is increased by ##$multibasic;## for ##$multibasic2;## seconds.$NL;$NL;ACE:##$pro;##$NL;This effect also applies to your crew when triggered.
menu_scavenging_beta_desc: เบสิค: ##$basic;##$NL;Your ammo box pick up range is increased by ##$multibasic;##.$NL;$NL;เอซ: ##$pro;##$NL;Every 6th enemy you kill will drop an extra ammo box.
menu_second_chances_beta_desc: เบสิค: ##$basic;##$NL;You gain the ability to disable ##$multibasic;## camera from detecting you and your crew. Effect lasts for ##$multibasic2;## seconds.$NL;$NL;เอซ: ##$pro;##$NL;You lockpick ##$multipro2;## faster. You also gain the ability to lockpick safes.
menu_sentry_targeting_package_beta_desc: เบสิค: ##$basic;##$NL;Your sentry guns gain a ##$multibasic;## increase in accuracy.$NL;$NL;เอซ: ##$pro;##$NL;Your sentry guns rotation speed is increased by ##$multipro;##. Your sentry guns also have  ##$multipro2;## more ammunition.
menu_sharpshooter_beta_desc: เบสิค: ##$basic;##$NL;You gain ##$multibasic2;## weapon accuracy with all SMGs, Assault Rifles and Sniper Rifles fired in single shot fire mode. $NL;$NL;เอซ: ##$pro;##$NL;You gain a ##$multipro2;## accuracy bonus while aiming down sights with all SMGs, Assault Rifles and Sniper Rifles fired in single shot fire mode.
menu_shock_and_awe_beta_desc: เบสิค: ##$basic;##$NL;You can now hip-fire with your weapons while sprinting.$NL;$NL;เอซ: ##$pro;##$NL;Killing ##$multipro;## enemies with SMGs, LMGs, Assault Rifles or Special Weapons set on automatic fire mode will increase your next reload speed by up to ##$multipro2;##. This bonus is reduced by ##$multipro3;## for each bullet above ##$multipro4;## in the total magazine size, down to a minimum of ##$multipro5;## reload speed increase.
menu_shotgun_cqb_beta_desc: เบสิค: ##$basic;##$NL;You reload Shotguns ##$multibasic2;## faster.$NL;$NL;เอซ: ##$pro;##$NL;You reload Shotguns ##$multipro;## faster. You gain a ##$multipro2;## increased steel sight zoom speed when using Shotguns.
menu_shotgun_impact_beta_desc: เบสิค: ##$basic;##$NL;Your weapon stability with all shotguns is increased by ##$multibasic;##. You deal ##$multibasic2;## more damage with Shotguns.$NL;$NL;เอซ: ##$pro;##$NL;You deal an additional ##$multipro2;## more damage with shotguns.
menu_show_of_force_beta_desc: เบสิค: ##$basic;##$NL;You take ##$multibasic;## less damage while interacting with objects.$NL;$NL;เอซ: ##$pro;##$NL;Increases the armor of all Ballistic vests by ##$multipro2;##.
menu_silence_expert_beta_desc: เบสิค: ##$basic;##$NL;You gain ##$multibasic;## weapon stability and ##$multibasic2;## snap to zoom speed increase with silenced weapons.$NL;$NL;เอซ: ##$pro;##$NL;You gain ##$multipro3;## weapon accuracy with silenced weapons.

menu_single_shot_ammo_return_beta_desc: เบสิค: ##$basic;##$NL;Getting ##$multibasic;## headshots in less than ##$multibasic2;## seconds will refund ##$multibasic3;## bullet to your used weapon. Can only be triggered by SMGs, Assault Rifles and Sniper Rifles fired in single shot fire mode.$NL;$NL;เอซ: ##$pro;##$NL;The amount of headshots required is reduced to ##$multipro;##.

menu_stockholm_syndrome_beta_desc: เบสิค: ##$basic;##$NL;Civilians are intimidated by the noise you make and remain intimidated ##$multibasic;## longer.$NL;$NL;เอซ: ##$pro;##$NL;Your hostages will not flee when they have been rescued by law enforcers. menu_tea_cookies_beta_desc: เบสิค: ##$basic;##$NL;เพิ่มเฟิร์สอีสคิทสำหรับใช้งานอีก ##$multibasic2;## อัน$NL;$NL;เอซ: ##$pro;##$NL;เพิ่มเฟิร์สอีสคิทสำหรับใช้งานอีก ##$multipro3;## อัน เฟิร์สอีสคิทจะถูกใช้งานอัตโนมัติถ้ามีผู้เล่นล้มในระยะ ##$multipro2;## เมตรจากเฟิร์สอีสคิท ความสามารถนี้ไม่สามารถใช้ซ้ำได้เป็นเวลา ##$multipro4;##
menu_tea_time_beta_desc: เบสิค: ##$basic;##$NL;ลดระยะเวลาในการวางด็อกเตอร์แบคและอุปกรณ์ปฐมพยาบาลเบื้องต้น ##$multibasic;##$NL;$NL;เอซ: ##$pro;##$NL;สมาชิกในทีมที่ใช้ด็อกเตอร์แบคหรืออุปกรณ์ปฐมพยาบาลเบื้องต้นของคุณจะได้รับความเสียหายน้อยลง ##$multipro;## เป็นเวลา ##$multipro2;## วินาที

menu_triathlete_beta_desc: เบสิค: ##$basic;##$NL;Increases your supply of cable ties by ##$multibasic2;##. This effect stacks with up to a maximum of ##$multipro2;## hostages.$NL;$NL;Note: This skill does not stack with other players Forced Friendship skill.
menu_trigger_happy_beta_desc: เบสิค: ##$basic;##$NL;For every hit with a pistol you gain a ##$multibasic4;## damage boost that lasts for ##$multibasic2;## seconds. Stacks up to ##$multibasic3;## times.$NL;$NL;เอซ: ##$pro;##$NL;Increases the damage boost duration to ##$multipro2;## seconds.
menu_underdog_beta_desc: เบสิค: ##$basic;##$NL;When three or more enemies within ##$multibasic;## meters are targeting you, you receive a ##$multibasic2;## damage bonus that lasts for ##$multibasic3;## seconds.$NL;$NL;เอซ: ##$pro;##$NL;When three or more enemies within ##$multipro;## meters are targeting you, you also receive a ##$multipro2;## damage reduction that lasts for ##$multipro3;## seconds.$NL;$NL;Note: Does not apply to melee damage, throwables, grenade launchers or rocket launchers.
menu_unseen_strike_beta_desc: เบสิค: ##$basic;##$NL;If you do not lose any armor or health for ##$multibasic;## seconds, you gain ##$multibasic2;## critical hit chance for ##$multibasic3;## seconds.$NL;$NL;เอซ: ##$pro;##$NL;The critical hit chance duration is increased to ##$multipro;## seconds.$NL;$NL;Taking any damage will cancel the effect.
menu_up_you_go_beta_desc: เบสิค: ##$basic;##$NL;You take ##$multibasic;## less damage for ##$multibasic2;## seconds after being revived.$NL;$NL;เอซ: ##$pro;##$NL;You receive ##$multipro;## more health when revived.
